1.3.1: Shows the correct UI for the new (non-captive) login flow. You should now see a hyperlink to retry the login in case you accidentally closed the browser's login window.
1.2.10: Now redirects to the correct domain for each customer when clicking on meeting overview.
There is now added sentry/Cloudwatch logging across the board for easier debugging. We didn't have any logs when customers were using the app before.
